content.raw:
it seems trac limits number of lines per message, so here's some more debug information:
{{{
(gdb) info threads
  Id   Target Id         Frame 
  10   Thread 0x7fffbe184700 (LWP 28535) "pool" 0x00007ffff5a6f0fe in pthread_cond_timedwait@@GLIBC_2.3.2 ()
   from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
  9    Thread 0x7fffbf5f5700 (LWP 28534) "gdbus" 0x00007ffff41e4b03 in poll () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6
  8    Thread 0x7fffbfdf6700 (LWP 28533) "dconf worker" 0x00007ffff41e4b03 in poll () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6
  7    Thread 0x7fffdaffd700 (LWP 28532) "gzclient" 0x00007ffff5a6ed84 in pthread_cond_wait@@GLIBC_2.3.2 ()
   from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
  6    Thread 0x7fffdb7fe700 (LWP 28531) "gzclient" 0x00007ffff5a6ed84 in pthread_cond_wait@@GLIBC_2.3.2 ()
   from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
  5    Thread 0x7fffd3fff700 (LWP 28530) "gzclient" 0x00007ffff5a6ed84 in pthread_cond_wait@@GLIBC_2.3.2 ()
   from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
  4    Thread 0x7fffdbfff700 (LWP 28527) "gzclient" 0x00007ffff5a6ed84 in pthread_cond_wait@@GLIBC_2.3.2 ()
   from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
  3    Thread 0x7fffe3fff700 (LWP 28523) "gzclient" 0x00007ffff7929830 in pthread_mutex_unlock@plt ()
   from /home/hsu/local/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
* 2    Thread 0x7fffe8b27700 (LWP 28522) "gzclient" 0x00007ffff793e075 in boost::asio::basic_socket<boost::asio::ip::tcp, boost::asio::stream_socket_service<boost::asio::ip::tcp> >::close() () from /home/hsu/local/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
  1    Thread 0x7ffff7fad840 (LWP 28519) "gzclient" 0x00007ffff41e4b03 in poll () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6
